pages.title: Discovering Spells
pages.text: Spells are a form to cast magic similar to glyphs. However, unlike the former, spells aren't consumed upon used, but instead have a set cooldown. A fixed cooldown will also be triggered if another spell of the same type is used.
After crafting an $(l)Exponentia Glyph$(), use it on a regular $(l)Crafting Table$() to transform it into a $(l)Spell Discovery Workbench$().
